description:
Durable and unrestrictive pants for project days and brewpub evenings. The integrated waist belt cinches up to maintain a send-ready fit when waistlines shrink during extended road trips. When beached whale topouts or alpine knees are unavoidable, the reinforced knees won't pooch out after half a season. Pockets galore house keys, wallets, phones and whatever else for when hitting the town.Made of durable yet soft heavyweight cotton and spandex.Integrated adjustable waist belt.Two front hand pockets, two rear pockets and a thigh pocket.Reinforced knees built to survive gnarly off-widths.Adjustable drawcord cuffs keep your feet free for heel hooks.

Relaxed fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
